/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and trucks are scattered along the street, hinting at the city's constant movement and activity. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
